titles.title: A resolution congratulating Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, on its 100th anniversary.
A resolution congratulating Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, on its 100th anniversary.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Congratulates Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, on its 100th anniversary.
Commends the Minnesotans who have made Brooklyn Center "A Great Place to Start and a Great Place to Stay."
